nodes.text: Bill Canterbury is a writer for Star Wars: The Clone Wars, a CGI-based television series that debuted October 3, 2008 on Cartoon Network as a continuation of the film with the same name, released two months prior. Bill also has written for TV shows such as The Simpsons (1993-1994), Scooby-Doo, Where Are You? (2004-2005), and Phil of the Future (2005).
